meta_description: Located in New York and California, the Paley Center founded by William S. Paley is the world's foremost institution dedicated to collect and preserve the best of television and radio programming and advertising.
hours_text:
# Visit **THE PALEY MUSEUM** in New York City

**Location** : Midtown Manhattan   
between Fifth & Sixth Avenue  
25 West 52 Street, New York, NY 10019  
212.621.6600

**Hours of Operation**

Wednesdays – Sundays 12:00 pm – 6:00 pm  
---  
Closed: Mondays and Tuesdays; New Year's Day, Independence Day, Thanksgiving, and Christmas  
  
[GET TICKETS](https://www.universe.com/events/the-paley-museum-admission-45-years-of-pac-man-tickets-MR4KT2?unii-trigger-open=MR4KT2&unii-access-key=GENERALPUBLIC)

### Notice

**PaleyGX closes early at 3:30 pm on January 3, 10, 11, 18, and 25.  
PaleyGX closes early at 4:00 pm on January 17 and 31. **

### Directions

  * **By bus** —Southbound on Fifth Avenue, Broadway, and Seventh Avenue; northbound on Madison Avenue and Avenue of the Americas (Sixth Avenue).
  * **By subway—** E or M to Fifth Avenue and 53 Street; N, R, or W to 49 Street and Seventh Avenue; 1 to 50 Street and Broadway; B, D, F, or M to 47-50 Street/Rockefeller Center.

[See a map of the area](https://goo.gl/maps/vnUupzhKeHFrTa8D8)

### Membership—enjoy exclusive once-in-a-lifetime experiences!

  * Priority RSVP, special VIP access and opportunities to Paley exhibits

  * Early ticket access with ticket discounts to red-carpet events with the hottest TV stars live and in person

  * Do you like video games? The PaleyGX Gaming Studio is Always FREE for Individual+ / Family Members and above

[BECOME A MEMBER](/join-us)

### Admission

  * FREE for Paley Members (and a Guest)
...

accessibility_text:
# From Storytime to Screentime

### Where books come to life—right before your eyes!

##### At ** _From Storytime to Screentime_** , kids and their grownups experience the magic of stories in a whole new way. Each session kicks off with a lively reading of a beloved children’s book, followed by its colorful TV adaptation on the big screen. Seeing favorite characters and adventures come alive helps kids connect with the story in exciting, memorable ways.

##### The fun doesn’t stop there! After the screening, families dive into creative arts, crafts, and hands-on activities inspired by the story—sparking imagination, self-expression, and plenty of smiles.

##### It’s reading, watching, and playing rolled into one joyful experience—only at The Paley Museum in New York and at The Paley Archive in the Beverly Hills Public Library.

##### **Paley Member Benefits:  
In NY: Storytime is free for Paley Members; included in General Admission.  
In LA: All families are welcome; only Paley Members can reserve spots in advance.**

### [**Los Angeles**  
The Paley Archive at the   
Beverly Hills Public Library](https://www.paleycenter.org/events/paleyarchive-bhpl/family)

### [**New York**  
The Paley Museum](https://www.paleycenter.org/events/storytime-to-screentime/ny)

### Become a Paley Member

**Paley Members enjoy FREE admission to The Paley Museum , including **_From Storytime to Screentime_.****

[BECOME A PALEY MEMBER](https://www.paleycenter.org/join-us/)

##  More Paley Events ...

### [ The Paley Museum is offering a series of free podcasting workshops for New York City high school students to gain experience in the growing field of audio storytelling. ](https://www.paleycenter.org/education/podcast-workshops)
